commit message:
Merge pull request #44 from pvagner/slovak

Added Slovak language file

Label some image buttons by specifying android:contentDescription
property so these buttons will be more accessible to users relying on
accessibility services such as Google Talkback.

Merge pull request #45 from pvagner/a11y

Provide text alternatives for image only buttons increasing overal app accessibility
added setting for hiding broken stations
do not show loading overlay when slide refreshing
